instruction: Write an accurate, engaging, and concise answer to the given question using only the provided conversations (some of which might be irrelevant). Use an unbiased and journalistic tone. Every sentence must include a citation at the end, referencing at least one conversation and at most three. When citing several conversations, use separate brackets for each index number, like [a][b][c], instead of combining them in one set of brackets, like [a, b, c]. Here, a, b and c represent different index numbers. If multiple conversations support the sentence, only cite a minimum sufficient subset of the conversations.
